none: media/user/SCRAPE/test/2021-12-2-foot-tall-jerk/extracted/2 Foot Tall Jerk/05 Call It Hell

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on December 13, 2021 Description from Terminal Escape:
 What the fuck is even happening here? Absolute outsider sounds - NEGATIVLAND, RESIDENTS, Confusion Is Sex, IDIOT FLESH....other music entirely. Sound freaks and sonic geeks, 2 FOOT TALL JERK create improvisational rackets that maybe sound like nothing else on earth and maybe sound like 1000 HOMO DJS providing the soundtrack for Miami Vice. I don't understand a world where this exists, and I don't understand this world. The intersection of noise and conceptualized "music" should leave you questioning...and 2 FOOT TALL JERK does exactly that. Other sounds - Welcome To 1994. GERMINATION
